publ: by Shenzhen Kean Digital Co., Ltd
name: AnnkeSight
0:
”Alexa, show the camera name”
”Alexa, stop the camera name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Now you can use Alexa to control all your ANNKE devices! You can turn on/off your camera simply by giving orders to Alexa. Alexa can show you the stream from supported devices.

1)Download the Annke Sight App from Apple Store or Google Play (skip to Step 5 when your cameras have been added).

2)Create a new Annke Sight account and log in.

3)Click the “Add Devices” icon and follow the on-screen instructions to add your ANNKE devices.

4)Download and turn on the Amazon Alexa App and log in to your Amazon account.

5)Tap the menu at the bottom right corner, and select “Skills & Games”.

6)Search for “Annke Sight” and select it, and then click Enable to Use.

7)Link your ANNKE account with Annke Sight username and password.

All is done! Now speak to Alexa to control your Sannce devices! Just say “Alexa” to invoke it.

*You can view live videos from all connected cameras on your Echo Show, Echo Spot, Fire TV (all generations), Fire TV Stick (2nd generation), and Fire Tablets (7th generation and later versions).

**Verbal Order Examples**

1)Alexa, show the bedroom.
2)Alexa, show the living room.
